p: Tocopherol standards (α-tocopherol, β-tocopherol, γ-tocopherol and δ-tocopherol, purity>98%) were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich Chemical (Nanjing, China). Brassicasterol, campesterol, and β-sitosterol standards (purity≥98%) were also purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Chemical (Nanjing, China). N-hexane, methanol, anhydrous ethanol, acetonitrile (HPLC grade) were obtained from Merck (Nanjing, China). Trolox, AAPH, fluorescein, PBS and other solvents and reagents (analytical grade) were purchased from Sinopharm Chemical Reagent (Shanghai, China).
